name: Let's Jump
description:
Let's Jump is a platformer game by Yusuf Abidin. Players are required to pass the existing obstacles. Players must walk to the finish line to get to the next level. Players have a life that will decrease if hit by obstacles and can increase if taking hearts. Players will die immediately when they fall. I hope players like this game.

Controls :

  • A / Left Arrow : Walk to the left
  • D / Right Arrow : Walk to the right
  • Space : Jump
  • Left Shift: Run
